titles.title: Clap Your Hands, All Ye People

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Clap your hands, all ye people.
Shout unto God, with the voice of triumph.
Clap your hands, all ye people.
Shout unto God, with the voice of praise.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hosanna! Hosanna!
Shout unto God with the voice of triumph.
Praise him! Praise him!
Shout unto God with the voice of praise.
